name: 室內樂研究（一）
description:
1.認識及欣賞各個時期、不同作曲家之室內樂作品。
2.培養及分辨各個時期、不同作曲家之室內樂作品風格的能力。
goals: 認識及欣賞各個時期、不同作曲家之室內樂作品。
培養及分辨各個時期、不同作曲家之室內樂作品風格的能力。
syllabus:
Class Schedule
--------------

Week 1  9/15   Introduction; Definition.

Week 2  9/22   Chamber Music in Baroque; Trio Sonata—Corelli, etc.

Week 3  9/29   The Classical Era—String Quartet and Haydn

Week 4  10/6   String Quartets of Haydn and Mozart

Week 5  10/13  **Quiz 1!**

Week 6  10/20  Piano Trios of Haydn and Mozart

Week 7  10/27  Piano Quartet and Quintet – Mozart, Chamber Music with Winds

Week 8  11/3   Piano Trios of Beethoven

Week 9   11/10  **Midterm!**

Week 10 11/17  String Quartets of Beethoven

Week 11 11/24  String Quartets of Beethoven

Week 12  12/1   String Quartets of Beethoven

Week 13  12/8  **Quiz 2!**

Week 14  12/15  Schubert

Week 15  12/22 Schubert

Week 16  12/29  Mendelssohn

Week 17  1/5     Schumann

Week 18  1/12    **Final Exam! Good Luck!!**

**Grading Policy:**

**Quiz 10% each**

**Midterm 25%**

**Final 25%**

**Presentation 10% each**

**Assignments 5%**

**Class participation 5%**
